description: The lives of several guests at a seaside hotel in England are turned upside down by the arrival of a glamorous divorcée.

title: The Old Man and the Sea
description: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic marlin. He is forced to endure a back-breaking struggle with the powerful fish and must contend with sharks who are after his prize.
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture

title: I Want to Live!
description: A prostitute is wrongly convicted of murder and sentenced to death. A psychologist and a reporter work to prove her innocence.

title: Ashes and Diamonds
description: On the last day of World War II, a young Polish resistance fighter is ordered to assassinate a Communist official, but he falls in love with a barmaid and questions his mission.

title: The Hidden Fortress
description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants escort a man and woman across enemy lines. However, they do not realize that their companions are actually a princess and her general.

title: Some Like It Hot
description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country by them and the police.

title: Ben-Hur
description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture

title: Anatomy of a Murder
description: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity induced by the rape of his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

title: The 400 Blows
description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy curses the infant Princess Aurora, decreeing that she will die on her 16th birthday.

title: Rio Bravo
description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

title: The Diary of Anne Frank
description: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

title: Pillow Talk
description: A man and a woman who share a party line cannot stand each other, but he falls for her when he meets her in person.
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen

title: The Nun's Story
description: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, doubt, and World War II.
